description: This is the main source file for a Flutter-based to-do application frontend. It defines the color scheme, task domain model, repository interface and implementation, app initialization, and the main UI components, including task listing, dialogs, and interaction logic.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines the color palette used throughout the app, including primary, secondary, error, background, surface, text, and muted colors.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Domain model representing a task with properties such as id, title, note, creation timestamp, and completion status.

classes.name: TaskRepository
classes.description: Abstract interface for task data operations, enabling fetch, add, update, delete, and toggle completion.

classes.name: InMemoryTaskRepository
classes.description: In-memory implementation of TaskRepository for local data handling, mimicking backend interaction.

classes.name: TaskController
classes.description: State management class using ChangeNotifier; manages task list and provides methods for various task operations.

classes.name: ToDoApp
classes.description: Root widget that initializes theming, dependency injection via Provider, and sets up the home screen.

classes.name: TaskListScreen
classes.description: Main screen displaying the list of tasks, with functionality to add, edit, delete, and toggle tasks.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the TaskController by fetching existing tasks.

methods.name: showAddDialog
methods.description: Static method to open the dialog for adding a new task.
